img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight against a large spider-like creature named "Violet Spider" in a dark, web-filled environment. The player character is engaged in combat, with visible attack effects and glowing projectiles striking the spider. The creature has multiple legs and emits white web-like strands. The user interface shows health and stamina bars at the bottom, along with ability icons on the left and right sides of the screen. The environment is dimly lit, with shadows and a hanging cocoon visible in the background.
